17:09 <vmassol> Denis: about your question related to http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/MBox+Macro#Attachments  
17:09 <vmassol> it was coded by Asiri (a previous comitter)  
17:09 <vmassol> if you have a more recent version of that macro, you should put it on xwiki-contrib and release it over that one  
17:10 <evalica> has quit  
17:10 <vmassol> especially since that page links to http://asiri.rathnayake.org/2009/10/11/xwiki-customize-presentation-with-wiki-macros/ for download and instructions and it no longer exists.....  
17:10 <mflorea> has quit  
17:13 <Denis> for the moment, I do not intend to put it in a repos, too much overhead for the purpose, but I will put a new version on e.x.o and mark it installable with EM
